author: FabriceNeyret2
description:

[img]https://i.imgur.com/b3gMiu0.png[/img]
image_code:
#define D         clamp( 1. - R.y*max(V.x,V.y), 0.,1.)     //
#define v(X,Y)    R/R.y*vec2(X,Y)                          //
#define B(X,Y)  ( V = U - v(X,Y), D )                      //
#define b(X,Y)    O = max(O, B(X,Y) );                      \
                  V = abs( v(X,Y) - U ) - .05,              \
                  O = clamp( O+C( v(X,Y)-.05, .05 ) -  D, 0.,1.);    //
#define C(C,r)    max(0., 1.-R.y* ( length(C-U) - r ) )    //
#define I(X)      U = abs(v-v(X,0)); O -= B(.025,.15) + C(v(0,.15),.04); //
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 u) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = abs( u+u - R ) / R.y, v = U, V;
    vec4 O = o;
    b(.7,.4) b(.6,.7)               /* core  */
    O -= B(.6,.07);                 /* slit  */
    O -= C(v(.6,.45),.05)           /* notch */
      +  C(,.14) + C(v(.45,0),.14); /* round holes  */
    I(.3) I(.6)                     /* narrow holes */
    o = O * (.6+.4*sin(4.*(u.x-u)/R - iTime)).y;}

#define rot(a)    mat2( cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)) )                    // rotation                  
#define B(a,l,L)  max(  max( abs(a).x, abs(a).y ) -l, abs(a).z -L ) // bar


void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    
    float t=9., a;
    vec3  R = iResolution, e = vec3(5,-5,0), X=e.xzz, Z=e.zzx,
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R : .01*cos(.5*iTime+vec3(0,11,0)),
          D = normalize(vec3( U+U, -2.*R.y ) - R ),      // ray direction
          p = 50./R, q,s;                                // marching point along ray 
    
    for ( O-=O ; O.x < 1. && t > .01 ; O+=.01 )
        q = p, t=9.,
        q.yz *= rot(-.4 -6.3*M.y),                       // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-.4 -6.3*M.x),
        s = q = q.xzy,
        t = min( t, max( -B((q-3.*Z),11.,2.), a = abs(q.z-15.)-1.5 ) ), // roof hole
        q.y += 2., q.yz *= rot(.4),
        t = min( t, B(abs(q)-X,.7,30.) ),                // ladder sides
        t = t = min( t, max( abs(q.z)-28.,  B(vec3(mod(q.z+2.5,5.)-2.5,q.yx),.5,5.) ) ),
        p += t*D;                                        // step forward = dist to obj          

   if ( a==t || O.x>1. && s.z<200.) O *= 0.;             // roof & horizon = blaxk
// if (s.z>200.) O *= vec4(.7,1,1,0);                    // coloring
}

author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
mouse control
[url]https://inktober.com/[/url]
#inktober2020 themes: [img]https://i.imgur.com/b3gMiu0.png[/img]
Reference image: [img] https://miro.medium.com/max/770/1*y8l3aj1E5z_QyjcI5NUxcQ.png [/img]
image_code:
#define rot(a)      mat2( cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)) )            // rotation                  

#define jaw(o)   \
        s = mod(o+16.*atan(q.x,q.z)/3.14,2.), s = min(s,2.-s),/* dents */           \
        t = min(t, max( abs(length(q.xz)-8.)-.1, max( abs(q.y-s)-1.5-s, -q.z ) ) ), /* round part */ \
        a = abs(q+4.*Z), t = min(t, max( max( abs(a.x-8.)-.1,a.y-1.5 ), a.z - 4. )) // straight part

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {    
    float t=9.,s;
    vec3  R = iResolution, e = vec3(1,-1,0), X=e.xzz, Y=e.zxz, Z=e.zzx,
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R : vec3(4,2,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)),
          D = normalize(vec3( U+U, -3.5*R.y ) - R ),          // ray direction
          p = 50./R, q,a;                                     // marching point along ray 
    
    for ( O-=O ; O.x < 1. && t > .01 ; O+=.01 )
        q = p, t=9.,
        q.yz *= rot( .4 +6.*M.y),                             // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-.7 -6.*M.x), 
        q.y += 5., q.z += 7., a = abs(q),
        t = min(t, max( length(q.xz)-3.5, abs(q.y-1.)-.1) ),  // plate
        t = min(t, max( length(q.zy) -.5,    a.x - 9.   ) ),  // axe
        a = abs(q+1.5*Y)-10.*X,  t = min(t, max( max( a.x-1.,a.y-.15 ), // bar
                                                 max( a.z-1.,.4-length(a.xz)) )),
        q.z-=7., jaw(),                                       // bottom jaw
        q.z+=7., q.yz*=rot(-1.5+1.1*atan(30.*sin(iTime))/1.5 ),q.z-=7., // animated opening angle
        q.x-=.4, q.y= -q.y, jaw(1.2),                         // top jaw
        p += .5*t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj          

    O = exp(-2.5*O) * vec4(1,1,1.2,1);                        // coloring
}

name: outline of sdf
author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
controling outline thickness  as minimal 1pixel thick vs given pixel width vs %scale.
( compare at various resolutions )
image_code:
#define S(v) clamp(1. - (v)/scale, 0., 1. )  // Antialiased draw
//#define S(v) smoothstep(1.5*scale, 0., v  )  // Note that these are assymetrical:
                                               // it's usually a bad idea, but here an abs() is expected in v 

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y;               // centred - normalize coordinates. Vertical = [-1,1]
    float scale = 2./R.y,                      // pixel width
            sdf = min( length(U)-.3 ,          // disk1 UNIONÂ disk2
                       length(U+.2+.2*sin(iTime) ) - .3);
    O = vec4( S(sdf) );                        // antialiased drawing of main shape
    O.r +=  S ( abs(sdf-.1) );                 // 1pix thick outline offsetted by 10% of unit scale.
    O.g +=  S ( abs(sdf-.3) -.05 );            // 5% of unit scale thick outline 
    O.b +=  S ( abs(sdf-.5) -4.*scale );       // 4 pixel outline 
    
    O = pow( O, vec4(1./2.2) );                // to sRGB
}

name: Fab21 #inktober2020 "sleep"
author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
mouse control
[url]https://inktober.com/[/url]
#inktober2020 themes: [img]https://i.imgur.com/b3gMiu0.png[/img]
image_code:
#define L length//
#define rot(a)      mat2( cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)) )            // rotation                  
#define B(q,a,b,c)  max( (q).x-a, max( (q).y-b, (q).z-c) )    // box
#define T(q,R,r)   ( L( vec2( L(L((q).xy) -R ), (q).z ) ) -r )// torus

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {    
    float t=9.,s,S,c,r,f,F=t;
    vec3  R = iResolution, Y = vec3(0,1,0),
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R-.5 : vec3(4,2,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)),
          D = normalize(vec3( U+U, -1.5*R.y ) - R ),          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0), q,a,k;                                 // marching point along ray 
    
    for ( O-=O ; O.x < 1. && t > .01 ; O+=.015 )
        q = p, t=9.,
        q.yz *= rot(-6. *M.y),                                // rotations,
        q.xz *= rot(-6.4*M.x),  q +=  vec3(0,9,10),           // translation
        k=q, k.xz = abs(k.xz), k.x<k.z ? k.xz=k.zx : U,       // crypt walls
        t = min(t, s = min( 15.-L(k.yx), k.y )  ),
        a = k, a.xz*=mat2(1,-1,1,1)*.5,                       // crypt arches
        t = min(t, S = T( a.yzx, 15.,.3) ), 
        t = min(t, r = T( q- 14.2*Y, .6,.1) ),                // ring
        a = abs(q+vec3(0,0,10)), t = min(t, B(a, 2.,1.,5.) ), // white base
        q = vec3( abs(q.x)-7., q.y-5., q.z+10. ),
        t = min(t, c = min( B(a, 1.8,3.,4.5) ,                // black coffin
                            max( L( q.xz ) - .3, q.y) )),     // candlesticks
        t = min(t, f = L((q-Y)/vec3(1,3,1)-.03*sin(30.*iTime+q.y))-.2 ), // flame
        F = min(F,f),                                         // for glow
        p += t*D;                                             // step forward = dist to obj          

    
    O = exp(-2.5*O);                                          // --- coloring
    O += vec4(1,.5,.2,0)* ( 2./(f*f) + .05/(F*F) );           // flame lighting + halo
    if (t==c || t==r) O *= .3;                                // coffin && roof ring
    if (t==S)  s=S, k.z=5.;                                   // arches
    if (t==s)  O *= vec4(1,.9,.8,1)                           // crypt walls
                  * texture(iChannel0, vec2( .1*k.z, atan(k.y,k.x)/.63 ));
}

name: Fab14 #inktober2020 "armor"
author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
mouse control
[url]https://inktober.com/[/url]
#inktober2020 themes: [img]https://i.imgur.com/b3gMiu0.png[/img]
image_code:
#define L           length
#define rot(a)      mat2( cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)) )                       // rotation                  
#define B(a,w,h,l)  max( max( abs(a).x -w, abs(a).y -h ), abs(a).z -l )  // bar

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    
    float t=9., a;
    vec3  R = iResolution, e = vec3(5,-5,0), X=e.xzz, Y=e.zxz, Z=e.zzx,
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R : vec3(4,2,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)),
          D = normalize(vec3( U+U, -3.5*R.y ) - R ),       // ray direction
          p = 50./R, q,s;                                  // marching point along ray 
    
    for ( O-=O ; O.x < 1. && t > .01 ; O+=.01 )
        q = p, t=9.,
        q.yz *= rot( .4 +3.*M.y),                          // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-.7 -6.*M.x),
        s = q += Y, a = 3.14/12.,                          // 12 folds copy-rot
        s.xz = L(s.xz)* cos(mod( atan(s.z,s.x) +a, a+a) -a +vec2(0,11)), // cylindrical symmetry  
        t = min(t, max( B( s-X ,.3,7.,1.2 ),               // body plank
                        2.-L( (q-.7*Y).yz) ) ),            // arm holes
        t = min(t, max(  B( s-.5*X-2.5*Y, .1,3.,.6 ),      // helmet plank
                        -B( q -Z-2.7*Y,  1.5,.5,3. )       // eyes hole
               )      ),
     // t = min(t, max( L((q-3.*Y).xz)-2.5 , abs(q.y-15.)-.1 )),      // helmet top
        a = t,
        t = min(t, max( L(vec2( L(q.x)-3., L((q-.9*Y).yz)-3.7) ) -.2, // handles
                        4.-q.y )),
        p += t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj          

 // if (t==a) O *= vec4(1,.8,.6,0)/.3;                     // coloring
    if (t==a) O = vec4(1,.8,.6,0) *exp(-5.*O);
}
